name: DENTAL
description: Dental services at both of our locations offer everything from cleaning to complex restorative procedures.

name: FAMILY PRACTISE
description: We provides complete medical care for your entire family from infancy to the oldest family members.

name: INTERNAL MEDICINE
description: Internal Medicine providers specialize in treating sometimes complex health conditions in adult patients that do not require surgery.

name: OB/GYN
description: Obstetrics/Gynecology (women’s health) is dedicated to providing care for the special needs of women.

name: OPTOMETRY/VISION CARE
description: Vision/optometry is available for adults and children.

name: PHYSICAL THERAPY
description: The Physical Therapists at Grace Health are musculoskeletal and movement specialists.
